# The Fun of YAML

> If something's wrong, just give me an error, YAML!

YAML can be amusing -- and by that, I mean it's genuinely frustrating. Unlike other languages, bad YAML doesn't always result in an error; instead, it opts for a more passive-aggressive approach.
